name: Sophias Pizza Restaurant
description:
Help Sophia make her dream of starting a successful pizza restaurant come true. Sophia’s Pizza Restaurant is a fun mash-up of match 3 and time management. Consider customer requirements, deal with the competition and earn tips from restaurant reviewers who will thoroughly analyze your pizzeria. Enhance your concept by beautifying and expanding your pizzeria. Invest in your restaurant to make your customers more satisfied and make Sophia’s Pizza Restaurant the best on the market!

- Over 100 exciting levels with T.M. elements
- Invest in your pizzeria to make guests happy
- Earn bonuses, extras and upgrades
- Solve clever puzzles and win cooking trophies
- Long-lasting match 3 fun!
